RecordAggregationJoinCondition.name: RecordAggregationJoinCondition
RecordAggregationJoinCondition.description: Represents a condition in a join between two record aggregation objects.

JoinField.description: The API name of the field on the record aggregation object's associated object that is used in the join condition.

NavigationSequenceNumber.description: The sequence number corresponding to this join in the join sequence from the object to which the data is aggregated to the object that contains the data being aggregated.

RecordAggregationObjectId.description: The record aggregation object with which this record aggregation join condition is associated.

RelatedJoinField.description: The API name of the field on the related record aggregation object's associated object that is used in the join condition.

RelatedRecordAggrObjectId.description: The second record aggregation object in the join condition.

Type.description: The type of this record aggregation join in the join path from the object to which the data is aggregated to the object that contains the data being aggregated.
